Class LevelView

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.views.LevelView
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelViewLevelTwo
public class LevelView extends Object
Represents the generic UI for a level, including health display and kill count.

    • LevelView

      public LevelView(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, boolean isLevelThree)
      Constructs a new LevelView.
      Parameters:
      root - the root Group for the level
      heartsToDisplay - the initial number of hearts to display
      isLevelThree - whether this is the third level
